original_text: When they were released, they went to their friends and reported what the chief priests and the elders had said to them.
korean_text: 사도들이 놓이매 그 동료에게 가서 제사장들과 장로들의 말을 다 알리니

sentences.original_text: and reported what the chief priests and the elders had said
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 대제사장들과 장로들이 말한 것을 보고했습니다
